flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: open up powerpoint onto a blank slide
lines.text_raw: open up powerpoint onto a blank slide

lines.text: right click on any task pane and make sure standard,formatting,control toolbox,drawing and visual basic are ticked (checked)
lines.text_raw: right click on any task pane and make sure standard,formatting,control toolbox,drawing and visual basic are ticked (checked)

lines.text: two task panes will come up. Just drag them to fit in at the bottom.
lines.text_raw: two task panes will come up. Just drag them to fit in at the bottom.

lines.text: Go down to one of the task bars which has just been dragged down and click on the hammer icon and then select Microsoft Forms 2.0 Command Button.
lines.text_raw: Go down to one of the task bars which has just been dragged down and click on the hammer icon and then select Microsoft Forms 2.0 Command Button.

lines.text: Then draw a button and rename it to 'search'
lines.text_raw: Then draw a button and rename it to 'search'

lines.text: Click on the hammer icon and select the Microsoft web browser.
lines.text_raw: Click on the hammer icon and select the Microsoft web browser.

guide.summary: this guide will show you how to make a web browser in power point 2003
guide.title: MAKE YOUR OWN WEB BROWSER
